title: Department of Home Affairs (Australia)
description: Official source for visas, citizenship, and immigration policies.

title: SkillSelect (Expression of Interest)
description: Apply for skilled visas (Subclass 189, 190, 491).

title: VEVO (Visa Entitlement Verification Online)
description: Check your visa conditions and expiry date.

title: VETASSESS (General Occupations)
description: Skills assessment for trades and professions (e.g., engineers, nurses).

title: TRA (Trades Recognition Australia)
description: Assessment for trade occupations (e.g., electricians, chefs).

title: ACS (IT Professionals)
description: Skills assessment for IT and computer science professionals.

title: AITSL (Teachers)
description: Assessment for teachers and educators.

title: Student Visa (Subclass 500)
description: Apply for or extend your student visa.

title: Temporary Graduate Visa (Subclass 485)
description: Post-study work visa for international students.

title: Work Restrictions on Student Visas
description: Understand your work rights and limits.

title: Fair Work Ombudsman
description: Know your workplace rights in Australia.

title: Skilled Independent Visa (Subclass 189)
description: Points-tested PR visa (no sponsor required).

title: State-Nominated Visas (Subclass 190/491)
description: Apply for PR through state sponsorship.

title: Employer-Sponsored Visas (Subclass 482/186)
description: PR pathways through employer sponsorship.

title: OSHC (Overseas Student Health Cover)
description: Mandatory health insurance for international students.

title: Medicare Eligibility Checker
description: Check if youâ€™re eligible for Medicare.

title: MARA (Migration Agents)
description: Find registered migration agents for legal advice.

title: Study in Australia (Official Guide)
description: Government portal for international students.

title: Reddit r/AusVisa
description: Community forum for visa advice and discussions.

title: SBS Immigration News
description: Latest updates on Australian immigration policies.

title: Australian Immigration Podcast
description: Podcast explaining visa rules and updates.

title: NSW Skilled Migration
description: State nomination for New South Wales.

title: Victoria Skilled Migration
description: State nomination for Victoria.

title: Queensland Skilled Migration
description: State nomination for Queensland.
